Transcript: Hi, this is Marilyn Shirley calling to invite you to a very exciting event on Sunday, February 15th. Jack Layton will be nominated as our federal candidate in Toronto Danforth. It begins at 5 p.m. at the upper House at 735 Queen Street East. We also plan to canvass every household in the riding earlier in the day. For more information, call (416)Â 591-5455. Extension 233. Hope to see you there.
